message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $15,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll see its value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $16,500 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I'm seeing that we both value this product. I'm willing to make my final offer at $17,250. This is a very competitive price for what you're getting.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $16,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
